reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Medical clinics system and its preparation in Hajjah Governorate (Wa’lan / Abs / Al-Gharza / mobile according to need) (Phase II)

description.narrative: Full readiness of medical clinics to provide basic health care services to (36,000) beneficiaries, provision of clinic services to (36,000) beneficiaries, and to enable (8) medical, technical and auxiliary staff to work in clinics and to provide a safe healthy environment.
Providing integrated health care service and providing trauma treatment service.
Saving life, maintaining its continuity, limiting the spread of diseases and epidemics, securing emergency health services, and the safe disposal of medical and medical waste.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
